description:
Morimoto Koji (Robot Carnival, Animatrix) and singer-songwriter Tamurapan showcase casual Ekoda-chan at home, in this, the series finale.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Morimoto Kouji x Tamurapan
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 12 - Morimoto Koji x Tamurapan
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 森本晃司 x たむらぱん
